content: Hi @Viet Nguyen I had a call with @Sree and he confirmed that Order Sign or Order Select CDS Hooks are not supported on Logica. So to proceed with our interoperability experiments we have a few options to proceed.

1. Use postman to Invoke CDS Hooks and manually pass on the appContext containing the template to the Smart APP.
  2. Modify the smart app in such a way that if an APP context is not passed on to it as input, we take in the information about the service requested and have the APP make a call to the CDS hooks service and get the cards and extract the app context from the cards and proceed normally like a DTR app.
  3. Move out of Logica to something else for testing.
